short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides you with 5 new articles everyday, each one corresponding to one of the 5 topics in the SDG, ‘Industry’

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
5 topics. 5 articles. 5 minutes. 
A single sentence can set off a lifetime of change. Every change starts with an idea, and every idea starts with a read. All it takes is 5 minutes a day to jump start your journey to bring about change. This extension provides you with 5 new articles everyday. Each article reaches an SDG related to industrial growth and change.
